content.title: Eosinophilic Granulomatosis with Polyangiitis (EGPA)
content.description: Formerly Churg-Strauss syndrome - eosinophil-rich necrotizing vasculitis

key_concepts.details: MPO-ANCA positive in 40-60%; ANCA-negative EGPA has more cardiac involvement
Cardiomyopathy and myocarditis major causes of mortality

content.clinical_significance: Distinct phenotypes based on ANCA status with different organ involvement

primary_sources: Comarmond C et al. Autoimmun Rev 2013
